article.title: CACI Awarded $29 Million Contract to Support Network Infrastructure Upgrade for Marine Corps
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: CACI International Incorporated has been awarded a task order with a ceiling value of $29 million by the U.S. Marine Corps under the U.S. General Services Administration's CONNECTIONS contract vehicle. This new work involves initially providing wide area network infrastructure design, fabrication, installation and validation of five microwave relay towers for the Naval Surface Warfare Center's Marine Air Ground Task Force Training Command.
